name: Tokophobia (AmericanApollo)
description:
You enter a strange liminal world filled with all sorts of nightmarish creatures. You play as an un named woman who tries to over come her fears after a traumatic life event that caused her life to change forever. Fight your way through the nightmarish recreation of her child hood and life traumas.  

Controls:

MoveWASDAimLMBShootRMBInteractE
Skip DialogueJ

WARNING!

THIS GAME COVERS THE FOLLOWING TOPICS WHICH SOME PEOPLE MIGHT FIND DISTURBING 

Sexual content

Gore
